price: Na tukampa huruma itokayo kwetu, na utakaso, na akawa mcha mungu.
arabic: وَحَنَانٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةٗۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waḥanānan min ladunnā wazakatan wakāna taqiyyan
